description:
Hack is being held at the customer center under suspicion of being Phantom Zero, where she`s questioned about the crime of forcibly erasing Love. Meanwhile, Berry learns from the mysterious Finn about how he and his comrades are ghosts, citizens who live in the city despite not being registered. Finn is skeptical that a fellow ghost would have helped Berry, and obtains the data on Phantom Zero from the paper plane device of Hack`s that Berry brought.
Source: Crunchyroll
